poem:
**For Tim Radford**  

In the folds of the daily page,  
a man with no textbook—  
only curiosity and  
that fire within—  
crafted a narrative,  
quiet, insistent,  
turning ink into thought,  
a bridge of words  
spanning the gap,  
unseen yet steadfast,  
and the cosmos leaned in,  
listening,  
as we all should.
